FuncDef: This command defines the starting point for a slope relative to the maximum depth of the queue-mbs value of the HSMDA slope policy. At the point the slope starts, it rises from a discard probability of zero until it reaches the max-depth and max-prob points defining where the slope rises directly to a discard probability of 100%.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the start depth for the high or low slopes.
